'''Radiant Spincrystal 117''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Neath the Fountain]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located at the [[Roots of Erinnyes]].
